Package renderer

Class Render

java.lang.Object
renderer.Render
public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
This class gets all the objects needed to create an image in our 3D graphic model
Author:
Naom Shushan

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int _antiAliasing
    the amount of rays in bean for anti aliasing improvement
    (package private) Camera _camera
    Perspective on the scene
    (package private) ImageWriter _imageWriter
    Handle the painting and producing the final image
    (package private) RayTracerBase _rayTracer
    trace the ray of each pixel and prodos the color
    private int _threadsCount
    number of threads
    (package private) boolean print
    flag of printing progress percentage
    private static int SPARE_THREADS
    Spare threads if trying to use all the cores

      public Render()

  • Method Details

    • renderImage

      public void renderImage()
      Produces an image with graphic shapes Paint them
      Throws:
      java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if missing some resource in order to create the image

    • castRay

      private void castRay​(int nX, int nY, int col, int row)
      Cast ray from camera in order to color a pixel
      Parameters:
      nX - resolution on X axis (number of pixels in row)
      nY - resolution on Y axis (number of pixels in column)
      col - pixel's column number (pixel index in row)
      row - pixel's row number (pixel index in column)

    • castBean

      private Color castBean​(java.util.List<Ray> bean)
      cast bean of rays
      Parameters:
      bean - bean of rays
      Returns:
      the average of the colors from the bean

    • renderImageThreaded

      private void renderImageThreaded()
      This function renders image's pixel color map from the scene included with the Renderer object - with multi-threading

    • printGrid

      public void printGrid​(int interval, Color color)
      Produces a pixel-sized matrix of the view plane and colors rows and columns
      Parameters:
      interval - the space between the rows and columns
      color - the color of the grid
      Throws:
      java.util.MissingResourceException - if image writer for the render is missing

    • writeToImage

      public void writeToImage()
      produces unoptimized png file of the image according to pixel color matrix in the directory of the project
      Throws:
      java.util.MissingResourceException - if image writer for the render is missing

    • setAntiAliasing

      public Render setAntiAliasing​(int numOfRaysInBean)
      setter for the number of rays in bean for anti aliasing improvement
      Parameters:
      numOfRaysInBean - the new number of rays in bean
      Returns:
      this render
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if numOfRaysInBean is lower then 0

    • setMultithreading

      public Render setMultithreading​(int threads)
      Set multi-threading
      - if the parameter is 0 - number of cores less 2 is taken
      Parameters:
      threads - number of threads
      Returns:
      the Render object itself
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if threads is lower then 0

    • setDebugPrint

      public Render setDebugPrint()
      Set debug printing on
      Returns:
      the Render object itself

    • setImageWriter

      public Render setImageWriter​(ImageWriter imageWriter)
      setter to the image writer
      Parameters:
      imageWriter - the new image writer
      Returns:
      this render

    • setCamera

      public Render setCamera​(Camera camera)
      setter to the camera
      Parameters:
      camera - the new camera
      Returns:
      this render

    • setRayTracer

      public Render setRayTracer​(RayTracerBase rayTracer)
      setter to the rayTracer
      Parameters:
      rayTracer - the new rayTracer
      Returns:
      this render
